law.text:
A savings and loan association may effect a statutory merger into any other savings and loan association, any savings bank, or any out-of-state association as defined in § 9-1001(i) of this title if the plan of statutory merger:
Complies with Title 3 of the Corporations and Associations Article;
Is approved by:
The board of directors of both the successor and the transferor;
The shareholders or members of a transferor association; and
The Division Director; and
The out-of-state association complies with § 9-1004 of this title.
